lib.starter:
Analyzing the library is needed. There are no song available.
Use: 
	addlib <absolutepath>
	analyze

cmd.wrong: Unknown command. Type 'help' for more info

help.addlib: Adds a folder to the library
help.addlibexc: Excludes a folder from the library
help.showlibs: Shows all the folders in the library
help.showexc: Shows all the excluded folders from the library
help.navFolder: Shows all the sub-folders of the given folder
help.navSongs: Shows all songs inside the give folder
help.queue: Adds a song to the playlist
help.list: Shows all current songs in the playlist
help.song: Displays the info of the given song
help.state: Shows the current state of the player
help.ip: Shows the Local IP in which the server is hosted
help.say: Sends a message to the chat
